description:
Get full protection and shelter from light rain. For hot days, a mesh lining manages sweat and the darkened underbrim reduces sun glare. The brim is stiffened with foam, so it floats if it gets blown into the water.

  • Made of burly woven recycled nylon that has UPF 50+ sun protection and a DWR finish
  • Breathable polyester mesh lining and embroidered eyelets vent heat
  • Soft recycled polyester sweatband keeps sweat out of your eyes
  • Foam-stiffened brim floats and holds its shape to keep sun out of your eyes
  • Adjustable shock cord in headband lets you customize the fit
name: MEC Sun Dodger Wide Brim Hat - Unisex
